categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: WRATH was the code-name of a highly skilled and accomplished Imperial Intelligence special agent who was charged with tracking down and disrupting the activities of the Rebel Privateer frigate Far Orbit. In order to accomplish this, WRATH followed the Far Orbit and directed Imperial agents to raid locations where the Far Orbit had recently visited. The goal of this tactic was to raise suspicions amongst the fringe elements of society from which the Far Orbit had garnered support, thus cutting the privateer's support network.
WRATH was characterized by his relentless, merciless devotion to his assignment.
